localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Connect with your loved ones and create lasting memories, with video messages from Canva. There’s always an occasion to celebrate, create customized video messages by yourself or with a group and make every moment special.
blogPost.body: Connect with your loved ones and create lasting memories, with video messages from Canva. There’s always an occasion to celebrate, create customized video messages by yourself or with a group and make every moment special.
blogPost.title: Video Messages from Canva - Celebrate any occasion with a group video message.
blogPost.author: Lachlan Andrews

localize.description: 通过Canva提供的视频信息，与您所爱的人保持联系，创造永恒的回忆。总会有庆祝的机会，自己或和团队一起制作定制的视频信息，让每一个时刻都变得特别。
localize.tagline: 用一条集体视频信息来庆祝任何场合。

localize.description: 通過Canva提供的視頻信息，與您所愛的人保持聯繫，創造永恆的回憶。總會有慶祝的機會，自己或和團隊一起製作定製的視頻信息，讓每一個時刻都變得特別。
localize.tagline: 用一條集體視頻信息來慶祝任何場合。

previous.excerpt: Generate the best and funny memes right from your device using Meme Dealer. The meme creation process is so simple and sleek; you will have fun using it every time.
previous.title: Meme Dealer - The easiest way to generate and create memes

localize.description: 使用Meme Dealer从您的设备上生成最好的和有趣的备忘录。备忘录的制作过程非常简单和时尚，您每次使用都会很开心。
localize.tagline: 生成和创建备忘录的最简单方法

localize.description: 使用Meme Dealer從您的設備上生成最好的和有趣的備忘錄。備忘錄的製作過程非常簡單和時尚，您每次使用都會很開心。
localize.tagline: 生成和創建備忘錄的最簡單方法

next.excerpt: This extension attempts to recover your suspended Great Suspender tabs by searching your browser history and displaying any found suspended tabs. You can then: - adjust grouping, sorting and detail - save as folders and bookmarks - copy URLs to the clipboard
next.title: The Great Suspender Recovery Tool - Recover your lost Great Suspender tabs

localize.description: 该扩展程序通过搜索您的浏览器历史记录并显示任何发现的暂停标签，试图恢复您暂停的Great Suspender标签。然后您可以 - 调整分组、排序和细节 - 保存为文件夹和书签 - 将URL复制到剪贴板上
localize.tagline: 恢复您丢失的Great Suspender tabs

localize.description: 該擴展程序通過搜索您的瀏覽器歷史記錄並顯示任何發現的暫停標籤，試圖恢復您暫停的Great Suspender標籤。然後您可以 - 調整分組、排序和細節 - 保存爲文件夾和書籤 - 將URL複製到剪貼板上
localize.tagline: 恢復您丟失的Great Suspender tabs
